Title: Dagger in the Dark
Description:
Shadow Hunter Vol'jin has joined a group of Kor'kron scouts on an important mission for the warchief.

Of course a proud member of the Horde such as yourself is welcome to go along, but be warned - it could get ugly.
ObjectivesText: Enter the "Dagger in the Dark" scenario and report to Vol'jin.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Enter the "Dagger in the Dark" scenario and report to Vol'jin.

Objectives.Text: Speak to General Nazgrim to queue for "Dagger in the Dark"
